Text:
I played halo cd some time ago, is halo pc different or is it just the same in a different package? 

Thnx for the up!
I meant I played halo ce some time ago.

it was differnet a long time ago ... there was only 1 cd (this is just over a cd... maybe a cd and a half), and it contains 'custom edition' which i dont have a clue wat it is ... and why is the trial packed with this?

Custom Edition lets you use custom maps, but its multiplayer only. (I included five custom maps for you, you can get more at halomaps.org). You can make custom maps too.

I included the Trial because it has a following and people still play it. It can be fun actually. Try it.

I play all three, I most frequently play CE 1.6 and PC 1.4.
SOrry for double commenting but I forgot to answer Son's question. Halo PC has more players, includes singleplayer, and does not allow you to play custom maps. I explained CE in my first comment.

Triple comment, I know I suck but the trackers for this are:

http://tpb.tracker.prq.to/announce

http://tpb.tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce
